answers.answer: Hi, this could be simple anxiety disorder, may be due to personality trait or otherwise. Other causes are hypothyroidism, vitamin B deficiency, hypotension, diabetes etc. Please try meditation, yoga or naturopathy for a month or so and if no relief is seen get yourself investigated.

question: I just found the site and have been experiencing the same symptoms for over a year,  I have been lightheaded, fatiqued, palpatations in my chest, some tingling in arms, chest, head,  this last for a week or 2, goes away for a week or 2 and so on for the past year....Any ideas, suggestions, ANYTHING!?!?!
title: On going problems
